extendedIngredients.name: roast beef deli slices

title: Roast Beef, Beet, and Arugula Salad with Orange Vinaigrette
summary: Roast Beef, Beet, and Arugula Salad with Orange Vinaigrette might be just the main course you are searching for. Watching your figure? This gluten free and primal recipe has 184 calories, 12g of protein, and 8g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 4. For $2.49 per serving, this recipe covers 19% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. A mixture of orange vinaigrette, beets, goat cheese, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. To use up the pine nuts you could follow this main course with the Pear Cake with Pine Nuts as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 72%. This score is good. Try Four Beet Salad On Arugula With Sherry Vinaigrette, Roasted Beet & Arugula Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette, and Roasted Beet and Arugula Salad with Maple Balsamic Vinaigrette for similar recipes.
instructions: Place beets in a microwave-safe bowl; add enough water to come halfway up sides of bowl. Cover with plastic wrap; vent. Microwave at HIGH 8 minutes or until tender; drain and cool. Peel and slice into wedges.                                                                                                 While beets cook, combine arugula and Orange Vinaigrette, tossing gently to coat. Arrange arugula mixture evenly on each of 4 plates. Top evenly with beef, beets, cheese, and nuts.

steps.step: Place beets in a microwave-safe bowl; add enough water to come halfway up sides of bowl. Cover with plastic wrap; vent. Microwave at HIGH 8 minutes or until tender; drain and cool. Peel and slice into wedges.
While beets cook, combine arugula and Orange Vinaigrette, tossing gently to coat. Arrange arugula mixture evenly on each of 4 plates. Top evenly with beef, beets, cheese, and nuts.
